Package com.kneelawk.graphlib.syncing.knet.api.graph

Interface KNetSyncedUniverse

All Superinterfaces:
SyncedUniverse
public interface KNetSyncedUniverse extends SyncedUniverse
KNet-based universe synchronization.

  • Method Details

    • readAttachingCodec

      static <B extends net.minecraft.network.FriendlyByteBuf, V> net.minecraft.network.codec.StreamCodec<B,V> readAttachingCodec(net.minecraft.network.codec.StreamCodec<? super B,V> wrappedCodec, Function<? super V,? extends KNetSyncedUniverse> getter)
      Creates a StreamCodec that wraps the given codec and attaches a universe read from the stream.

      This provides both the ATTACHMENT_KEY and GraphUniverse.ATTACHMENT_KEY attachments.

      Type Parameters:
      B - the buffer type.
      V - the result type.
      Parameters:
      wrappedCodec - the codec to wrap and provide the universe attachment to.
      getter - the function to get the universe from the wrapped type.
      Returns:
      the created stream codec.

    • readAttachingOp

      static <B extends net.minecraft.network.FriendlyByteBuf, V> net.minecraft.network.codec.StreamCodec.CodecOperation<B,V,V> readAttachingOp(Function<? super V,? extends KNetSyncedUniverse> getter)
      Creates a StreamCodec.CodecOperation that attaches a universe read from the stream.

      This provides both the ATTACHMENT_KEY and GraphUniverse.ATTACHMENT_KEY attachments.

      Type Parameters:
      B - the buffer type.
      V - the result type.
      Parameters:
      getter - the function to get the universe from the wrapped type.
      Returns:
      the created codec operation.
